languages.text: "Стихи подобны искрам костра, уносимым ветром — лишь стихнет их звучание, как угаснет память о них. Надеюсь, наше чувство более долговечно, чем какая-то надпись". {n}Джай легкомысленно смеется.{/n}

"Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Стихи подобны искрам костра, уносимым ветром — лишь стихнет их звучание, как угаснет память о них. Надеюсь, наше чувство более долговечно, чем какая-то надпись". {n}Джай легкомысленно смеется.{/n}

"Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

"Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

"Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

languages.text: “诗歌就像是被风吹散的火花一样。它们的声音一旦停歇，对它们的记忆也会随之凋零。我希望我们所拥有的一切，能比墙上的这些文字坚持得更加长久。”{n}婕伊发出了轻松的笑声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “诗歌就像是被风吹散的火花一样。它们的声音一旦停歇，对它们的记忆也会随之凋零。我希望我们所拥有的一切，能比墙上的这些文字坚持得更加长久。”{n}婕伊发出了轻松的笑声。{/n}

languages.text: 「詩は風に流される火の粉のようなもの。言葉の響きが消えると同時に、その記憶も枯れゆく。アタシらが持っているものが、壁に描かれたどんな言葉よりも長く続くことを願っているよ」{n}ジェイは爽やかに笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「詩は風に流される火の粉のようなもの。言葉の響きが消えると同時に、その記憶も枯れゆく。アタシらが持っているものが、壁に描かれたどんな言葉よりも長く続くことを願っているよ」{n}ジェイは爽やかに笑う。{/n}

languages.text: «Los poemas son como chispas de una hoguera trasladadas por el viento. Su recuerdo se desvanece en cuanto el sonido de sus palabras se calla. Espero que lo que hay entre nosotr{mf|o|a}s dure más que las palabras de una palabra». {n}Jae ríe, jovial.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los poemas son como chispas de una hoguera trasladadas por el viento. Su recuerdo se desvanece en cuanto el sonido de sus palabras se calla. Espero que lo que hay entre nosotr{mf|o|a}s dure más que las palabras de una palabra». {n}Jae ríe, jovial.{/n}

languages.text: « Les poèmes sont comme les étincelles d'un feu emportées par le vent : leur souvenir s'estompe à l'instant même où leurs mots cessent de résonner. J'espère que le lien qui nous unit sera plus résistant que de simples mots écrits sur un mur. » {n}Jae conclut sa phrase en riant avec désinvolture.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les poèmes sont comme les étincelles d'un feu emportées par le vent : leur souvenir s'estompe à l'instant même où leurs mots cessent de résonner. J'espère que le lien qui nous unit sera plus résistant que de simples mots écrits sur un mur. » {n}Jae conclut sa phrase en riant avec désinvolture.{/n}

languages.text: "Gedichte sind wie die Funken eines Feuers, die vom Wind davongetragen werden – die Erinnerung an sie erlischt, sobald der Klang ihrer Worte verhallt. Ich hoffe, unsere Beziehung hält länger als Worte, die auf eine Wand geschrieben wurden." {n}Jae lach frisch-fröhlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gedichte sind wie die Funken eines Feuers, die vom Wind davongetragen werden – die Erinnerung an sie erlischt, sobald der Klang ihrer Worte verhallt. Ich hoffe, unsere Beziehung hält länger als Worte, die auf eine Wand geschrieben wurden." {n}Jae lach frisch-fröhlich.{/n}

languages.text: "Şiirler, rüzgârın taşıdığı ateş kıvılcımları gibidir. Sözcükleri sarf eden ses yok olduktan sonra, anıları da çok geçmeden kaybolur. Umarım bizim sahip olduğumuz şey, duvarlara yazılı sözcüklerden daha uzun sürer." {n}Jae canlı bir sesle gülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Poems are like sparks of a fire carried away by the wind — the memory of them withers as soon as the sound of their words dies away. I hope what we have lasts longer than any words drawn on a wall." {n}Jae laughs breezily.{/n}
